[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Blazen_Rock, xrushha, legodude17, amnabi, Kitsunes mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2418407014 with permission
- Added EnableOversizedWeapons as a requirement instead of including it in the mod

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] This mod is officially dead. I'm forever grateful to all the people who supported this project. If you'd like to adopt this mod, hit me up on the Rimworld Discord: Blazen_Rock [hr][/hr] [h1]Big Swords and Exoframes Help Brawlers Keep Mechanoids at Bay.[/h1] Have you ever wanted to chop mechanoids to pieces with an oversized sword? Lay waste to your enemies with a red-hot incendiary cannon? Crush the under the immense presence of a psychic warhammer? Now you can do that and more with this mod.
[h1]Tools of the Trade[/h1] Heavy Melee Weapons provides users to make melee combat a bit more engaging via the introduction of powerful weapons and equipment. [img]https://imgur.com/RTpSa8u.png[/img]

[h1] Compatibility[/h1] Heavy Melee Weapons has compatibility patches for these mods: [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?edit=true&id=2520200610]Combat Extended[/url][/b]- Caulaflourer [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2329126791&searchtext=Vanilla+Weapons+Expanded]Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Heavy Weapons[/url]- Allows Pawns with Exoframes to equip heavy melee weapons Misha's [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2019999267&searchtext=Craftable+Royalty+Weapons]Craftable Royalty Weapons[/url] - Research required to craft HMWs is merged into Ultratech Weapons. [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2178003816&searchtext=Persona+bonding+Forgw]Persona Bond Forge[/url]- Adds craftable persona variants of Heavy Melee Weapons
Heavy Melee Weapons must be loaded after: Harmony Royalty Vanilla Expanded Framework
Heavy Melee Weapons should be loaded before: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2364527746]Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Heavy - Reloading Patch[/url]
[h1]Language Patches[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2508921477&tscn=1623300371]Chinese[/url] - Made by MZM_GOW
